Name: Time
About the game: Time is a musical experience designed for Virtual Reality where geometry and materials react to audio while using 3D sounds to increase the immersiveness. The experience is inspired by the passing of time and the different stages in life, with multiple elements referencing this theme and leaving the interpretation to the user. Music and VR experience created by David Arosemena.
Meta Title: Time: Sep 13, 2018, David AE and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Time? Check out the release date (Sep 13, 2018), developer insights from David AE, and a complete game summary.
